Text.val: Author: Stephan Huppertz
02.07.2014 GB SCR19001 2. Display ...: Extended selection with ADMN_TESTCLIENTS = N
23.04.2014 JH SCR18848 Added button Handled
15.10.2013 JH SCR18465 Added condition PAIN_BANKFILETYPE = 0 to update of PAIN_BANKFILETYPE
06.03.2013 JH SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
04.04.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
30.03.2012 SH SCR17231 Button Advice (OAD330A): Extended update PAIN_BANK_LEDG_NO with CTBA_SEPA_LEDG_NO for SEPA
27.03.2012 SH SCR17222 Button Advice (OAD330A): Added test on PAIN_BANKFILETYPE = 0 to perform updates on this field
02.08.2011 SH SCR16620 OAD330INIT Added button Recreate
17.05.2011 SH SCR16448 Removed GNRL_CURRENCY (was not used)
10.02.2011 SH SCR15665 Disabled PAIN_BANK_ADMNO/BANK_LEDG_NO for modification
if PAIN_LEDGERBOOKED = Y
21.05.2010 SH SCR15551 Introduced flexible updates/checks on bank file types,
via new fields BANK_BANKFILETYPE_AUTCOLL and BAFD_PAYMENTSTODEBTORS
20.05.2010 SH SCR15549 Fixed bug: Modification on PAIN_URGENT were not stored to
23.03.2010 SH SCR15405 If GNRL_CODE= 'PL' then no initial update of checkbox
25.02.2010 SH SCR15344 OAD330A Added missing test PAIN_BANK_LEDG_NO = 0 and
removed the third test on CTBA with only admin and currency test; Added updated
some more PAIN fields if another ledger number is entered
-- Variables are set in the Initialization part of OAD330 and used
in the further processes to select PAIN
-- Shortcut labels
-- Get separate permission
... for button Release
... for button Recreate
-- Initialization for OAD330INIT (= payments to debtors)
-- Shortcut handling
-- PAIN rows, which are finally transferred to banks, are not
-- Initialization for further handling (only once at program start)
-- Button Advice
-- Button Leder bookings
-- Button Prepare fiels
-- Button List
-- Button Generate files
-- Button List remaining
-- Button Delete
-- Initializations (batch)
-- First cleanup the temp trable
-- Then set PAIN_ACTIVEUSER to lock the PAIN rows
1. for other users
2. to have a fixed set of PAIN rows (to avoid problems if PAIN rows
are added by other programs, in the meanwhile of the active OAD330
session
-- Finally populate temp table for the use on the first screen
-- Display a screen where the users are able to decide manually
for which set of PAIN rows (PAIN_ADMN and PAIN_HGRP_CODE) they want
to continue
-- Prepare range string for ADMNO and HGRP_CODE for further selections on PAIN
and set PAIN_ACTIVEUSER = blank for PAIN rows which are unchecked on the screen
-- Button Release
... re-initialize the temp table
-- Button Recreate
... re-initialize the temp table
-- Button Handled

SQL_STMT_U.val: update :1/PAIN set PAIN_ACTIVEUSER = ':2' where PAIN_TRANSFERRED = 'N' and PAIN_APPROVED = 'Y' and PAIN_ACTIVEUSER = '' and :3 and PAIN_TYPE in (:4) and exists (select * from :1/ADMU where ADMU_ADMNO = PAIN_ADMNO_DEBTOR and ADMU_HUSR_ID = ':2' and ADMU_ALLOW_CREATE_BANKFILES = 'Y')

select PAIN_ADMNO_DEBTOR, PAIN_HGRP_CODE, COUNT(*) as COUNT from :1/PAIN where PAIN_TRANSFERRED = 'N' and PAIN_APPROVED = 'Y' and PAIN_ACTIVEUSER = ':2' and :3 and PAIN_TYPE in (:4) and exists (select * from :1/ADMU where ADMU_ADMNO = PAIN_ADMNO_DEBTOR and ADMU_HUSR_ID = ':2' and ADMU_ALLOW_CREATE_BANKFILES = 'Y') group by PAIN_ADMNO_DEBTOR, PAIN_HGRP_CODE order by PAIN_ADMNO_DEBTOR, PAIN_HGRP_CODE for fetch only

Text.val: -- Set current filter criterias to re-initialize the PAIN selection
... at least on of the 4 payment checkboxes must be selected, so if they're all
unchecked, auto. vv.Debtors is checked
-- Set selection criterias for further usage

... refresh screen

... refresh screen
... get string of users who locks PAIN rows, to message box

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('SCR[OAD330INIT]: Initialization payments to debtors / automatic collections')
{0,7} AND NOT ({0,9}) AND NOT ({0,10}) AND NOT ({0,11}) AND NOT ({0,12})

SQL_STMT_U.val: update :1/PAIN set PAIN_ACTIVEUSER = '' where PAIN_TRANSFERRED = 'N' and PAIN_APPROVED = 'Y' and PAIN_ACTIVEUSER = ':2' and :3 and PAIN_TYPE in (:4) and exists (select * from :1/ADMU where ADMU_ADMNO = PAIN_ADMNO_DEBTOR and ADMU_HUSR_ID = ':2' and ADMU_ALLOW_CREATE_BANKFILES = 'Y')

select PAIN_ACTIVEUSER from :1/PAIN where PAIN_TRANSFERRED = 'N' and PAIN_APPROVED = 'Y' and PAIN_ACTIVEUSER <> '' and :3 and PAIN_TYPE in (:4) and exists (select * from :1/ADMU where ADMU_ADMNO = PAIN_ADMNO_DEBTOR and ADMU_HUSR_ID = ':2' and ADMU_ALLOW_CREATE_BANKFILES = 'Y') group by PAIN_ACTIVEUSER order by PAIN_ACTIVEUSER for fetch only

Text.val: -- At least one row must be selecetd

SQL_STMT_U.val: update :1/PAIN set PAIN_ACTIVEUSER = '' where PAIN_TRANSFERRED = 'N' and PAIN_APPROVED = 'Y' and :3 and PAIN_TYPE in (:4) and PAIN_ACTIVEUSER <> '' and exists (select * from :1/ADMU where ADMU_ADMNO = PAIN_ADMNO_DEBTOR and ADMU_HUSR_ID = ':2' and ADMU_ALLOW_CREATE_BANKFILES = 'Y')

Text.val: -- PAIN_ACTIVEUSER is set to blank via DSQL, see SQL command box
@Temp table is immed cleaned up
... set PAIN_ACTIVEUSER = blank for rows which are unchecked on the

SQL_STMT_U.val: update :1/PAIN set PAIN_ACTIVEUSER = '' where PAIN_ADMNO_DEBTOR = :3 and PAIN_HGRP_CODE = ':4' and PAIN_TRANSFERRED = 'N' and PAIN_APPROVED = 'Y' and :5 and PAIN_TYPE in (:6) and PAIN_ACTIVEUSER = ':2' and exists (select * from :1/ADMU where ADMU_ADMNO = PAIN_ADMNO_DEBTOR and ADMU_HUSR_ID = ':2' and ADMU_ALLOW_CREATE_BANKFILES = 'Y')

Text.val: -- Variables for tabular view (sorted by tab order)
-- The screen with Totals per bank has to be refreshed if the bank data
of the previous PAIN row was changed
... auto. update of file type and settlement
... auto. update of file type and settlement
... screen refresh to achieve also a screen refresh for screen with totals
per bank
-- Payment has to be handled manually, set vars to 0
... auto. update of file type and settlement
... auto. update of file type and settlement
... screen refresh to achieve also a screen refresh for screen with totals
per bank
... auto. update if bank bank admin or ledger number is changed

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('SCR[OAD330]: Payments to debtors / Automatic collections')

SQL_STMT_U.val: select PAIN_BANK_ADMNO, PAIN_BANK_LEDG_NO, min(BANK_NAME), PAIN_CURRENCY, cast(sum(PAIN_AMOUNT) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/PAIN left outer join :1/BANK on BANK_ADMNO = PAIN_BANK_ADMNO and BANK_LEDG_NO = PAIN_BANK_LEDG_NO where PAIN_TRANSFERRED = 'N' and PAIN_APPROVED = 'Y' and :5 and PAIN_TYPE in (:6) and PAIN_ACTIVEUSER = ':2' and PAIN_ADMNO_DEBTOR in (:3) and PAIN_HGRP_CODE in (:4) group by PAIN_BANK_ADMNO, PAIN_BANK_LEDG_NO, PAIN_CURRENCY order by PAIN_BANK_ADMNO, PAIN_BANK_LEDG_NO, PAIN_CURRENCY for fetch only

Text.val: -- Check admin and ledger number of bank, both fields could be set to 0
on screen
... auto reset of wrong entered bank data
-- Check bank file type
... auto reset of wrong entered bank data
-- Entered file type is not allowed for automatic collections
... auto reset of wrong entered bank data
-- Entered file type is not allowed for payments
... auto reset of wrong entered bank data
-- Costs must be >= 0
... auto reset of wrong entered bank data
-- Payments --> Costs exceeded amount to transfer
... auto reset of wrong entered bank data
-- Check settlement code
... auto reset of wrong entered bank data
-- Set trigger to refresh the screen with totals pewr bank if PAIN_BANK_ADMNO or
PAIN_BANK_LEDG_NO is changed
-- Reset variables
-- Try to fetch a ledger number from COUNTRY_BANK
... with ADMN_ADMNOGLPACKAGE, CLNA_BANKCOUNTRY, CLNA_CURRENCY
... if not exists with ADMN_ADMNOGLPACKAGE, CLNA_BANKCOUNTRY
-- Only if a ledger number was found in CTBA, use this to update PAIN
-- Obtain BANK for update on PAIN_BANKFILETYPE

SQL_STMT_U.val: update :1/PAIN set PAIN_ACTIVEUSER = '' where PAIN_TRANSFERRED = 'N' and PAIN_APPROVED = 'Y' and PAIN_ACTIVEUSER = ':2' and :3 and PAIN_TYPE in (:4) and exists (select * from :1/ADMU where ADMU_ADMNO = PAIN_ADMNO_DEBTOR and ADMU_HUSR_ID = ':2' and ADMU_ALLOW_CREATE_BANKFILES = 'Y')
